mapper.sql: a.employee_id AS "employeeId", a.email AS "email", a.mobile AS "mobile", a.user_id AS "userId", a.merchant_id AS "merchantId", a.name AS "name", a.level AS "level", a.status AS "status", a.type AS "type", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.update_time AS "updateTime", a.remarks AS "remarks"
LEFT JOIN sys_user u4 ON u4.id = a.user_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO hgms_merchant_employee( employee_id, email, mobile, user_id, merchant_id, name, level, status, type, create_time, update_time, remarks ) VALUES ( #{employeeId}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{userId}, #{merchantId}, #{name}, #{level}, #{status}, #{type}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE hgms_merchant_employee SET status = #{status,jdbcType=CHAR}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE employee_id = #{employeeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
